result.eng: The men were able to work hard.
result.ga: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.orig: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.html: Bhí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.

result.eng: Don't ask me to do it, I wouldn't be able for it.
result.ga: Ná hiarr sin orm ní bhéinn in ann aige
result.orig: Ná hiarr sin orm ní bhéinn in ann aige
result.html: Ná hiarr sin orm ní bhéinn in ann aigeDon't ask me to do it, I wouldn't be able for it.
result.ponchtml: Ná hiarr sin orm ní ḃéinn in ann aigeDon't ask me to do it, I wouldn't be able for it.

result.eng: You do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ga: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.orig: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.html: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit seolaḋ a ṫaḃairt aċ má ḋéanann tú aṁlaiḋ beiḋ muid in ann freagra pearsanta a ṫaḃairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.

result.eng: I had made promises I wasn't able to keep.
result.ga: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Thug mé geallúintí nach raibh mé in ann a chomhlíonadhI had made promises I wasn't able to keep.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug mé geallúintí naċ raiḃ mé in ann a ċoṁlíonaḋI had made promises I wasn't able to keep.

result.eng: You will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ga: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí
result.orig: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí
result.html: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairíYou will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú in ann leaḃra a ṫaḃairt aḃaile agus úsáid a ḃaint as na ríoṁairíYou will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.

result.eng: I am reasonably good on the computer and I am able to use Word and Excel.
result.ga: Tá mé réasúnta maith ar an ríomhaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáid
result.orig: Tá mé réasúnta maith ar an ríomhaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáid
result.html: Tá mé réasúnta maith ar an ríomhaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáidI am reasonably good on the computer and I am able to use Word and Excel.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé réasúnta maiṫ ar an ríoṁaire agus tá mé in ann Word agus Excel a úsáidI am reasonably good on the computer and I am able to use Word and Excel.

result.eng: Open the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.
result.ga: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailt
result.orig: Oscail an bosca a Mhama Níl mé in ann é a oscailt

result.ponchtml: Oscail an bosca a Ṁama Níl mé in ann é a oscailtOpen the box, Mommy. I am not able to open it.

result.eng: I am not able to buy it.
result.ga: Níl mé in ann é a cheannacht

result.html: Níl mé in ann é a cheannachtI am not able to buy it.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé in ann é a ċeannaċtI am not able to buy it.

result.eng: I am not able to close the door.

result.eng: We will not be able to celebrate her birthday.

result.html: Ní bheidh muid in ann a lá breithe a cheiliúradhWe will not be able to celebrate her birthday.

result.eng: There were people there, I heard them shouting, but I wasn't able to touch them.
result.ga: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo
result.orig: Bhí daoine ann chuala mé ag béiceadh iad ach ní raibh mé in ann tadhall leo

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ga: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht

result.eng: Estate owners were not able to attract workers from Europe to America.
result.ga: Ní raibh úinéirí na n-eastát in ann oibrithe a mhealladh as an Eoraip ná as Meiriceá
